game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.beginning: In the world of Tenria, where ancient magic has awakened, players take on the role of a novice Timekeeper tasked with restoring balance to the timestream.
game.synopsis: As they journey through mystical realms and forgotten cities, they unravel a sinister plot by the Shadowhand organization to exploit the fabric of time for their own power. The player must master the art of chronomancy, navigating the intricacies of timelines, and make pivotal choices that shape the fate of Tenria's inhabitants.
game.ending: Ultimately, the Timekeeper confronts the enigmatic leader of the Shadowhand in a climactic battle that determines the course of eternity for the world of Tenria.
